title: Science Knowledge Acquisition Program Through VR-Based Scaffolding Game Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific concepts and foundational knowledge of experimental procedures
context.additional_context: Education for adult learners with varying motivation levels, integrating VR games and offline activities using personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can apply the four stages of the scientific methodology (problem definition–hypothesis formulation–experiment design–results analysis) in a VR environment with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can identify all 10 laboratory safety rules through VR simulation and execute appropriate response procedures within 3 seconds in hazardous situations.
Learners can correctly answer at least 12 out of 15 questions on experimental equipment usage in a formative assessment after game-based learning activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
